subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Back in 1984, with a wicked slap shot and a dynamic left arm, Tom Glavine passed up a free college education and a chance at playing in the N.H.L. to sign with the Atlanta Braves.
snippet: Back in 1984, with a wicked slap shot and a dynamic left arm, Tom Glavine passed up a free college education and a chance at playing in the N.H.L. to sign with the Atlanta Braves.
